snippet: On Sunday, an annual charity match on Long Island between New York City’s Police and Fire Departments was interrupted by a 20-minute melee.
abstract: Tension between New York City Fire Department and Police Department erupts in public, leaving an old rivalry newly exposed; latest episode takes place on Long Island, during an annual charity hockey match between the Bravest and the Finest that turned into a melee on ice; neither department would comment about the fight or say whether any of the players would be disciplined.
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, an annual charity match on Long Island between New York City’s Police and Fire Departments was interrupted by a 20-minute melee.

headline.main: Hockey Brawl Is Old Story of Policemen vs. Firemen
headline.print_headline: Hockey Brawl Is Old Story of Policemen vs. Firemen
